title: A Day in June: disengagement in the Golan
creator_credit: Joe O'Brien, Edward Magruder Jones, Gilbert Lauzun and United Nations Films
brief_description: In June 1974, a new United Nations peace-keeping force took up positions in the war torn Golan Heights. The force was called UNDOF - United Nations Disengagement Observer Force and its mandate, to observe that the ceasefire agreements, signed in Geneva by Israel and Syria, were adhered to.
